title.native: 進化の実～知らないうちに勝ち組人生～
title.romaji: Shinka no Mi: Shiranai Uchi ni Kachigumi Jinsei
title.english: The Fruit of Evolution: Before I Knew It, My Life Had It Made

description:
Hiiragi Seiichi is an ugly, revolting, dirty, smelly fatass; these are the insults hurled at him one after another about his appearance. Such was Seiichi's daily school life of bullying, then for some reason, one day when school was out, a voice claiming to be a God said over the PA system to prepare to be transported to another world. What's more, not Seiichi alone, but the entire school. A fantasy world where game-like elements such as as levels, stats, and skills exist. However, the God still had preparations to complete for the transfer, and would send them over as soon as the hero summoning ritual was ready. The classes all formed groups to wait for the transfer, but Seiichi alone was discluded and as such was summoned to a different area. After being transported the first thing Seiichi ate was the "Fruit of Evolution". This would come to greatly change his life

This story is about how Seiichi went from being severely bullied by his classmates, even not being recognized for his accomplishments, and despite all that staying positive and surviving in this new world. As a result, he somehow becomes one of the champions.
hashtag: #進化の実 #勝ち組人生 #ゴリラ系女子
synonyms: ผลไม้วิวัฒนาการ: ชีวิตผู้ชนะแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Polyamorous
tags.description: Features a character who is in a consenting relationship with multiple people at one time.

node.description:
Poppin'Party is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Aimi](https://anilist.co/staff/109519/Aimi-Terakawa) (as [Kasumi Toyama](https://anilist.co/character/120229/)) on rhythm guitar and vocals
- [Sae Otsuka](https://anilist.co/staff/120235/) (as [Tae Hanazono](https://anilist.co/character/120232/)) on lead guitar
- [Rimi Nishimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/120234/Rimi-Nishimoto) (as [Rimi Ushigome](https://anilist.co/character/120231/)) on bass
- [Ayaka Ohashi](https://anilist.co/staff/110903/Ayaka-Ohashi) (as [Saaya Yamabuki](https://anilist.co/character/120233/)) on drums
- [Ayasa Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118799/Ayasa-Itou) (as [Arisa Ichigaya](https://anilist.co/character/120230/)) on keyboard and tambourine

Poppin'Party first started out with Aimi, Rimi Nishimoto, and Ayasa Itou, before adding the other two members to become a full band. They debuted with the song "Yes! BanG_Dream!".

__Height:__ 150 cm

[Fanclub](https://www.gokinjolno.jp/) | [Blog](http://nanjolno.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nanjolno) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nanjolno/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFJORT2GGeNsKKLCf3BqSEQ)

She was the vocalist of the band fripSide and graduated in April 2022 with the fripSide Phase 2 Final Arena Tour. Likes cats, Final Fantasy XIV (even dubbed and sung the battle theme of Suzaku), and ramen.

**Non anime roles:**
- Soltina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Noise - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Topaz - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Shu - Arknights (VG)
- Junah - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Trigger - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

[Company site's profile (Hifumi Inc.)](https://hifumi-inc.co.jp/ogura-asuka/)

Ogura Asuka is a composer, arranger, and lyricist affiliated with Hifumi Inc.

[Website](https://deltastyle.amebaownd.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sky_delta)

**Date of Birth:** 1995
**Birthplace:** Kanto, Japan

**sky_delta** is a Japanese composer. Influenced by game music, he started composing music in 2010, and has provided music for numerous music games, starting with the music for the rhythm game "SOUND VOLTEX" in 2014.

His motto is to create music that has an impact on the listener, and he has worked on various genres of music from club sounds to band sounds. In 2015, he formed the music unit *Endorfin*, and has been steadily expanding his activities, including a full-scale effort in pop music.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/gussy_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/gussy_/)__

__Hideyuki Gushimiyagi__ is a Japanese guitarist, composer and arranger.
